name: Yahtris
description:
A Tetris-like game for the GMTK Jam 2022 made with JhimJhim.

Combine dices vertically or horizontally to destroy dices.

Controls

A,D / Side arrows to move
S / Down arrow to drop
R to roll the dice (only once per dice)
T to setup sounds

Credits

Fonts: Kenney Pixel Square
